text.section:
As necessary or advisable to protect the safety of employees of a fireworks plant and the public and to protect public property, the State Fire Prevention Commission shall:
adopt regulations consistent with this subtitle; and
enforce the regulations through the office of the State Fire Marshal.

The scope of the regulations adopted under this section may include:
the implementation of this subtitle; and
requirements relating to:
the location, construction, arrangement, and operation of a fireworks plant;
personnel;
public liability and workers' compensation insurance; and
fireworks plant safety.
